events.content: A fundamental course in Web Development utilizing contemporary standards, methods, and tools for students to develop skills in creating and deploying web-based content. Students learn development concepts spanning markup and programming languages and libraries, local and hosted environments, versioning control systems, and development tools.
events.content2: The objectives of this course are for students to: 1. relate web development concepts and terminology, 2. demonstrate the usage of web development technologies, 3. develop web-based content, 4. determine deficiencies in web-based interface design, 5. create improved web-based interfaces
